document_data.name: Hibiscus
document_data.mainbody: '''Hibiscus''' were hardy flowers from which [[tea]] could be made.

Ecology.Uses:
Hibiscus were sometimes used as decorative flowers. They were cultivated in the [[City of Delights/Public Gardens|Public Gardens]] of the [[City of Delights]] in Zakhara alongside [[rose]]s and similar blooms.

A spicy hibiscus tea was said to be widely popular in Chessenta as of the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
